payload.name: idempotency-keys-deduplication
payload.title: Idempotency keys + deduplication: retries must be safe
payload.formal: operation (op(k)) with idempotency key (k) must satisfy (op(k)) applied multiple times ≡ once.
payload.apm2_mapping: tool requests already include `dedupe_key`, and work transitions include sequence checks. Make idempotency a hard requirement for any side-effecting tool: file writes, git ops, deploys. If you cannot make it idempotent, wrap it in a transactional boundary and record a receipt.
